author: Aaron Blake
title: The timeline of Trump’s coronavirus response is increasingly damning
description: A January memo from White House trade adviser Peter Navarro is the latest in a long series of warnings.
content: Navarro would later follow that up with a Feb. 23 memo that offered an even more dire prediction. There is an increasing probability of a full-blown COVID-19 pandemic that could infect as many as 100 million Americans, with a loss of life of as many as 1-2 mi… [+6764 chars]
